mapper.select: SELECT ALARM_NO, ALARM_TYPE_NO, ALARM_CONTENT, QUICK_LINK, READ_FL, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ALARM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN TO_CHAR(ALARM_DATE, 'AM HH"시" MI"분"') ELSE TO_CHAR(ALARM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ALARM_DATE, (SELECT ALARM_TITLE FROM ALARM_TYPE ALAT WHERE ALAT.ALARM_TYPE_NO = ALA.ALARM_TYPE_NO) AS ALARM_TITLE FROM ALARM ALA WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
